name: Pure Heart Jewel Knight, Ashlei
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):At the end of the battle it attacked, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], search your deck for up to one grade 2 or less card with "Jewel Knight" in its card name, call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck. If this unit is on (VC), call up to two cards instead of one.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When your other unit is placed on this unit's circle, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and that placed unit gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn.

name: Battle Sister, Fromage
effect:
[CONT](VC):During your turn, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, all of your units with "Battle Sister" in their card names get [Power] +5000.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], and draw a card. If you have a vanguard with "Battle Sister" in its card name, draw a card.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Discard a card from your hand], look at the same number of cards from the top of your deck as the number of your units with "Battle Sister" in their different card names, and put each card you looked at on the top or bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Battle Sister, Trifle

[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When you look at your deck by an effect during your turn, you may have this unit get [Power] +5000 until end of turn. (Activates for "look", "reveal", and "search" effects. +5000 regardless of number of cards looked at with one effect)

[CONT](RC):If your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets "Boost".
[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your grade 3 or greater unit is placed during your battle phase, if this unit is in the back row, you may [Stand] this unit.
productName: [VGE-V-SS08] Special Series 08 Clan Selection Plus Vol.2

name: Ingenuous, Mernil
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][reveal a normal unit from your hand, and put it on the bottom of your deck], and draw a card.
[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your grade 3 or greater unit is placed during your battle phase, if this unit is in the back row, you may have one of your vanguards get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
productName: [VGE-V-SS08] Special Series 08 Clan Selection Plus Vol.2

name: Masterly Cover, Minne
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw two cards, return a card from your hand to your deck, and shuffle it. If you do not have a rear-guard with the same card name as your vanguard on your (RC), return three cards to your deck instead of one.
productName: [VGE-V-SS08] Special Series 08 Clan Selection Plus Vol.2

name: Equable Career, Spiana
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, you may return a card with the same card name as a grade 3 card on your (VC) or (RC) from your drop zone to your deck. If you returned a card, shuffle your deck, and [Counter-Charge 1].
productName: [VGE-V-SS08] Special Series 08 Clan Selection Plus Vol.2

name: Rainy Tear, Stezza
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle it boosted a vanguard, [COST][retire this unit], draw a card, then, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put a grade 3 card from your drop zone on the bottom of your deck], and draw a card.
productName: [VGE-V-SS08] Special Series 08 Clan Selection Plus Vol.2

name: Blue Wave Marshal, Valeos
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's vanguards, and until end of turn, it gets [Power] -5000, and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, its [Power] cannot increase or decrease other than by this effect and guardians' [Shield] .
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Discard a card with the same card name as your vanguard from your hand], remove all markers from your circles, and call up to five cards from your drop zone to (RC).
[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle that your unit attacked, choose two of your rear-guards, and you may exchange their positions.
productName: [VGE-V-SS08] Special Series 08 Clan Selection Plus Vol.2

name: Blue Wave Soldier Senior, Corvette

productName: [VGE-V-SS08] Special Series 08 Clan Selection Plus Vol.2

name: Regalia of Wisdom, Angelica

At the end of that turn, ride a "Evil Stealth Dragon Akatsuki, Hanzo" from your soul as [Rest].
[AUTO](Soul):When your vanguard with "Hanzo" in its card name attacks, [COST][retire a grade 0], call this card to (RC), and until end of turn, this unit gets [Power] +20000 and can attack from the back row. At the end of that turn, put this unit into your soul. If you put it into your soul, call an Evil Decoy token to (RC).

At the end of that battle, if that attack did not hit, [Stand] that unit, and if that attack hit, that unit gets drive -1 until end of turn.
